overview: Best friends Mary-Ann (Foster) and Sandy (Thompson) are finally taking their dream expedition to New Zealand. They are  accompanied by their teenage daughters Jaretha (Gillette) and Kerry (Nicoll). Issues of first night frights from the local wildlife and daughters that can't stand each other  become insignificant when they come face to face with Kiwi poachers.  No match for gun-toting guys, the four find themselves held prisoner and fearing for their lives.
tagline: Their Passports Let Them In, Can Their Courage Get Them Out
title: Lost Valley
